products.title: Day & Night Flecked White
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Day & Night Effortless White
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Origin, White - Day Night Blind
products.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: Luna Softshade Pure White Day and Night Blind
products.description: Brighten up your windows with this smart and versatile day and night roller blind. The luna softshade pure white day and night roller blind boasts an adjustable design that is great for bringing calm and seclusion to any space whilst allowing plenty of natural light to filter through. Made using strips of white polyester and voile fabric, this versatile blind is ideal for downstairs, street facing rooms.

products.title: Vision White PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.description: This beautiful neutral white blind features tiny perforations that allow small specks of light to softly filter through. The effect is to maximise natural light while preventing glare to create a cool and relaxing environment. The pure white blind will match elegantly with t this beautiful neutral white blind features tiny perforations that allow small specks of light to softly filter through.

products.title: Vogue, White - Day Night Blind
products.description: The sharp, icy hue of the vogue in white gives a clean and fresh look, and the sleekness of the fabric does nothing to contradict it. With its moveable translucent strips, for privacy and light control, this blind is truly the height of contemporary style. Team the white with a deep, dark navy blue to form a naval theme in the dining room. A navy feature wall, with the blind sat in its midst, will look simply stunning.

products.title: Nobis Softshade Ivory White Day and Night Blind
products.description: Whether working, relaxing or sleeping, the nobis softshade ivory white day and night roller blind is a versatile choice for convenient light control in any room. Additionally, the attractive design in ivory white will suit a range of interior styles. This stylish blind features horizontal panels of quality polyester fabric and voile to offer both privacy and a soft light filtration to keep your space feeling open and bright.

products.title: Mero Softshade Soft White Day and Night Blind
products.description: For a bright and airy feel to your space, opt for the mero softshade soft white day and night roller blind. This practical window blind uses a stylish and functional design that offers various levels of shading to suit your requirements for your space whatever time of day. This version in white fabric with voile strips is light, fresh and contemporary. Product id: db-vrbx1868 fabric colour: soft white material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes mero softshade soft white day and night blind in white.

products.title: Luxa, White - Vista Blind
products.description: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood. Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor.

products.title: Bayham, Pure White - Vista Blind
products.description: To allow the light that enters your room to take centre stage your blind should be crisp and clean. Modern lines give bayham pure white the contemporary look that allows it to hang with effortless grace in your home as it offers complete control of the ambient light levels. The finely crafted voile panels serve as the perfect accompaniment for the clean glow of pure white. Keeping your decor simple yet styled is the secret to creating a contemporary home that will stay current for years to come.
